snippet: Mr. Bush could be setting up a G.O.P. showdown with a protégé, Marco Rubio, and another Bush vs. Clinton presidential campaign.
abstract: Former Florida Gov Jeb Bush publishes book Immigration Wars, arguing for overhaul of nation's immigration system and legal status for illegal immigrants, but without a path to citizenship; Bush, however, finds himself quickly backpedaling from hardline stance set forth in book, which was perhaps intended as an opening salvo in bid for the presidency in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush could be setting up a G.O.P. showdown with a protégé, Marco Rubio, and another Bush vs. Clinton presidential campaign.

headline.seo: Jeb Bush Could Be Signaling 2016 Interest
headline.main: Jeb Bush Enters Debate, and Possibly 2016 Race
headline.print_headline: Jeb Bush Enters Debate, And Possibly 2016 Race
